name: The Thrills of CSS
description: Like stuff centered? CSS can do that. Like blue? CSS can do that.

name: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
description: A web app that will give users 10 new technical questions each day and track their progress in things like programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more!

name: Why is it so hard to type a back tick
description: You love it, you hate it, the powerful yet badly placed back tick.
